page.title: 09The Game Larder
page.content:
The Game Larder is a business that you would not expect to find so close to the built up areas of Kingston and London. Local game is caught and sold from this farm shop.
{Venison}-Deer are shot in the surrounding Surrey hills as are wood pigeon, pheasant, partridge and rabbit. The latter are again becoming quite a problem in the area and farmers are pleased that their numbers are being controlled. All the animals are hung in the Larder, skinned and sold mainly to private buyers and not to restaurants as expected. {Trout}-About 2000 to 3000 trout are kept in the two tanks again for sale but these are not found wild but brought from the trout farms..
